message.content: {"given_definition_quality":50,"better_definition":"text (used for study)","sentence":"我读课文。","image_prompt":"A young student sits at a simple desk in a softly lit classroom, reading an open book with visible Chinese characters, evoking a gentle, apocalyptic atmosphere; faded school posters on the walls and mild sunlight breaking through a window, details animated as if softly swaying.","sentence_translation":"I read the text."}
